author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

En route to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33354#issuecomment-820580988 I came across somewhat confusing use of `None` in the `_TypedParameterizable` constructor. This PR attempts to clean it up as it does not seem to have any real purpose.

Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/133

#### PR validation:

Framework unit tests run.
title: Remove confusing use of None from _TypedParameterizable constructor
